name: Alstroemeria
description:
What’s worse than seasonal allergies that give you runny nose, stuffy nose, sniffles and sneezes? Pollen from Alstroemeria! The ecosystem of the Spirit Realm — Alstroemeria — is deteriorating, and the mutated pollens from the realm are spilling over to our reality, transforming humans into spirits. It is up to you, an undergrad research assistant, to help find the cure to de-transform humans by traveling through Alstroemeria.

(There are two different endings!)
